Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text:
Over from England for a weekend. Absolutely incredible dinner, excellent host, phenomenal wines, no complaints at all
Will be back! Great atmosphere.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text:
This restaurant is always a pleasure. In an informal, living room type of atmosphere you dine and wine with the best food and most beautiful wines.
Staff is super friendly, approachable and professional.  We love coming here and we have never been disappointed. Must visit!

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: This was such a great dining experience. There was such a delicious, fresh and innovative tasting menu paired with maybe some of the best wines I’ve had. The owner has a clear passion for what he does- it shines through. I felt incredibly …

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: If you like fine wine and dining you will not be disappointed a beautiful atmosphere

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: I had the best food and dining experience of my life here. Intimate and absolutely delicious. Our dinner was 3-4 hours, 5 courses, each with a wine pairing introduced by Hans himself. A great way to mark a special occasion.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Great food paired with excellent and surprising wines in a very friendly atmosphere!! One of the best places in the wide area.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Absolutely superb! Booked for my girlfriend's birthday and we had a great time. Food is simple and yet very original. Great selection of wines and a fantastic hospitality offered by Hans.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: What nice simple and excellent place! Had a special wine paring with a 5course dinner. Eclectic plates, quality ingredients, and most importantly the place wasn’t “stuffy”... Good service by owner and overall good and easy time. Recommend. (Had trouble finding the place as it’s tacked away between local streets)

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Wonderful, friendly service from staff and owners who clearly knew their stuff. Interesting and tasty dishes were personally introduced by the chefs and accompanied by a wide selection of matching wines; some good, some mind blowing. A worthwhile, long experience (we sat at the table for over 4 hours).

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: This is clearly a very fancy place. You pay for what you get. So it's not cheap but food and wine are just delicious and the pairing is magistral. The owner does not about wine and really takes the time to explain what you're served and …

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Fantastic wine selection to pair excellent dishes. Thank you Hans and team for a very nice evening!!!

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: We walked in after the kitchen was closed late one night this past July. The owner, a very special character, offered to open up a bottle of an Italian Sangiovese of my choice, lit up a candle and started a great conversation about the good …

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: What a wonderful birthday meal I enjoyed here earlier this week. The ambiance is perfect and the service was totally on point. Hans, our host, was superb in his delivery of excellent wines and his knowledge and passion was evident. This is …

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Wow. Best restaurant in years. Its a challenge for your mouth. The wines are perfectly selected. Service is the best. So this is a "must" for anyone with a great taste.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Made a reservation in advance for Valentine’s Day. Restaurant arbitrarily cancelled the reservation a week before, without explanation or apology, leaving me to scramble to make last minute plans. Do not assume that your reservations will …

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: The best dinner of my life without a doubt! The pairing is incredible and makes it a unique experience, the food is fabulous and the attention of Hans 100 Points!

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Be prepared to drink a great deal of excellent wine and try some tasty and unique bites. Hans will take good care of you and your party.  Pricey but delightful.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Last Saturday June 5th, we booked a table at De Utrechtsedwarstafel. After months of restaurants being closed, this restaurant was the absolute first we wanted to go to again. Hans and Esther always make you feel very much at home and their …

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Relxed atmosphere, great service and very cosy homely feel. Great variety of dishes, paired wines and hospitality.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text:
Visiting this restaurant is an experience unlike none other.
The food was delicious and every dish was described to us how it was made by the chef herself ! …

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Amazing service, outstanding varying menu with excellent wine pairing. Highly recommend as a local, living just a few blocks away having discovered this restaurant by chance recently

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Hans was a legend.  Great food and matched wines.  Don’t interrupt them though when they are explained  the course.  Salmon and “crispy stuff” was a winner.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: What a wonderful birthday meal I enjoyed here earlier this week. The ambiance is perfect and the service was totally on point. Hans, our host, was superb in his delivery of excellent wines and his knowledge and passion was evident. This is …

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Verry special restaurant for wine lovers.  The serve 3,4 or 5 course gastronomic surprise menu du chef. All comes with uplifting wine, fully explained by the friendly staff. Not too chic, not too casual. Price/quality wise good.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: We had amazing food here, paired with amazing wines. The staff was absolutely lovely and treated us really well. It was a great experience!

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: The quality of the food and service received was somehow disconnected from the price we paid. The food was ok (nothing out of the ordinary), but it took 5 hours to complete a 5 course menu and the atmosphere was ruined by the owner who in several occasions shouted at the waiter.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Best dining experience for people not liking too many options. Simple. Great great great food matched with fabulous wine. Michelin star experience

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Nestled away discretely in a cute, quiet alleyway is this treasure of a restaurant. Hans warmly greeted us, led us to our table, and with a few short questions crafted the best dining experience of our vacation. Each dish was thoughtful in …

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Have been coming here for years, my favorite restaurant in Amsterdam! Great food, amazing wines, cozy atmosphere. Highly recommended.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Really great restaurant with good food! Would recommend this restaurant if you're nearby.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: So glad we found this place! Came for the 4 course during truffle week with wine pairing, and it was some of the best cuisine we've ever enjoyed. …

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Excellent food, really friendly service and great wines with the food. Really like the concept of just choosing how many courses you want and not choosing your actual food. We went for 4 courses and the matching wines and were not disappointed. A great place to eat.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: This was hands down the best meal I've had in Amsterdam. Igor made an octopus salad for the starter that I could eat for the rest of my life and I don't even like octopus - or at least I thought I didn't. …

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Have been coming here for years, my favorite restaurant in Amsterdam! Great food, amazing wines, cozy atmosphere. Highly recommended.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Went here with high expectations due to the stellar review score and expectations of loads of information about our wine pairings (which we did not receive unless asked about the wine food combination). Unfortunately we left a bit …

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Best in the World!   A thoroughly enjoyable evening...who knew that dinner out could be such a lovely experience.   Fabulous food paired impecably with delightful wines, and congenial, enthusiastic and informative hosts.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Great dining experience!  Amazing food and fantastic wines. A must when you are in Amsterdam! Excellent service, with explanation for every course and wine. Excellent value for money.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Amazing food. not a salmon eater but the starter was so fresh tasting.  main duck was so tender it was as if ut was chicken melting.  I dont eat the  dessert served but was truely balanced in flavour.  very happy

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text:
Perfect.

Friendly staff who accommodate your every need. …

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: The truffle menu with wine pairings made for one of the best meals I've ever had! Gezellig atmosphere and people too.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: In this place I have spent one of my best culinary experiences, the personalized attention, the expectation of not knowing what the next surprise will be, the Stories, the wines, the atmosphere was incredible, without realizing I spent more than 6 hours enjoying each bite, each drink of wine in this Magical Place

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Fantastic food and wine pairing. It's quite expensive but completely worth it.  The table you book is yours for the entire night so you never feel rushed to leave.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Randomly walked in after arriving in amsterdam and was absolutely floored by the welcoming atmosphere, the food and the wine selection. One of the best meals I have ever had, hands down.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: What a great place, always cosy and the food is great. Tip..take the better wines, the regular ones are great but wow the premium selection is mind blowing

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: This place is top. Food was delicious and the wine selection was AMAZING. There are very few restaurants like this in Amsterdam.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Interesting combination of foods and matching wines. Some of the wines are quite specific/specialist but this makes for a memorable dinner.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Lovely, lovely staff. Cozy atmosphere. However, food and wine were only OK for the pricing.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Amazing food, wine pairing, and hosting! Thanks for this exceptional experience!

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Brilliant! Fantastic menu, great wines, with very welcoming and informative hosts.

Name: Utrechtsedwarstafel
Review Text: Very nice place, super delicious food, pricey, recommend for people who love wines
